_header: Upon a time come to Jesu
_description: Gospel for Wednesday after First Sunday in Lent, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Opon atyme come to ihesuScribes and many a phariseu…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …He þat so dose what sum he beMy moder and my broþer es he
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Accesserunt ad ihesum scribe & cetera.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: fferia quarta proximo secundum Matheum (rubric, f. 44rb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.44-49.
